title: Contact Us - Customer Service | Better Your Health
author: Sign In
description: If at any time you have questions about our products or need help with an order, our Customer Service Team is ready to help. Find out how to contact us.
cleaned_text: Contact Us Contact Us Have questions? We have answers! Here are a few easy ways to contact us about the products, websites and customer care processes for our family of brands. Call Us 1-800-209-1005 Monday to Friday 9:00 a.m. - 5:30 p.m. ET
